text: Deutsche Schule Santa Cruz () is a German international school in Santa Cruz de la Sierra, Bolivia."Contáctenos " (Archive). Deutsche Schule Santa Cruz. Retrieved on March 23, 2015. "Av. San Martín s/n" It serves levels Kindergarten through the sixth year of secondary school."Secundaria > Cursos "/"Klassen ." Deutsche Schule Santa Cruz.
